text:
Hi everyone here!  I have a team/roles question I’m hoping you can help with. I’m currently the HOC at a B2B tech co.  Soon I will also be responsible for social media, PR, etc.  We’re potentially looking to add someone to my team that is a bit more brand focused but I’m not quite sure what to call the position.

The person would be responsible for bridging insights from PMM (personas, market intel and product) into 1.) positioning, and 2.) (biggest focus) customer facing messaging and language, including core responsibility for messaging on website, top tier content, etc.  It’s a copywriting focused role (as in I definitely need someone who can execute real copy for a variety of channels), but with the need for an extended skillset around higher-level positioning, as well as understanding of design/web to collaborate with designer to create web pages that accomplish objectives and get the message across.

It seems a bit like an Associate Creative Director role. Other titles that have been thrown out include Comms Manager, etc.  Does anyone have examples of titles or role descriptions that sound similar to this?

elements.text:

Soon I will also be responsible for social media, PR, etc.  We’re potentially looking to add someone to my team that is a bit more brand focused but I’m not quite sure what to call the position.

The person would be responsible for bridging insights from PMM (personas, market intel and product) into 1.) positioning, and 2.) (biggest focus) customer facing messaging and language, including core responsibility for messaging on website, top tier content, etc.  It’s a copywriting focused role (as in I definitely need someone who can execute real copy for a variety of channels), but with the need for an extended skillset around higher-level positioning, as well as understanding of design/web to collaborate with designer to create web pages that accomplish objectives and get the message across.

It seems a bit like an Associate Creative Director role. Other titles that have been thrown out include Comms Manager, etc.  Does anyone have examples of titles or role descriptions that sound similar to this?

text: Brand Copywriter could be a fit? This actually sounds somewhat (though not entirely) similar to our copywriter at Alma — until we grow our creative team, they're serving as copywriter and creative operations / project manager, working on just about everything — positioning, site updates, ad development, etc. To me, including "brand" in the title hints at strategic thinking / positioning.

text: +1 to the Brand Copywriter title since it's not a more senior role
